event.title: July 2008, the old town (Mangalem district) was inscribed

data.event: In July 2008, the old town (Mangalem district) was inscribed on the UNESCO World Heritage List.
The municipality was formed at the 2015 local government reform by the merger of the former municipalities Berat, Otllak, Roshnik, SinjÃ« and Velabisht, that became municipal units.
